step-1.title: Step 1: Recherches
step-1.texts:
If we work together, we'll talk about.

It's not about doing my project for you, it's about project.

step-2.title: Step 2: Chatting
step-2.texts:
If we work together, we'll talk about you.

It's not about doing my project for you, it's about your project!

You know your business better than anyone else.
